<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the currently selected weapon state for unit or vehicle.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.69.140397 this command has been improved and extended:
* A vehicle's weapon query doesn't need a weapon operator provided the weapon or muzzle is specified in optional param.<br>(keep in mind that by default a vehicle has no weapons selected)
* Driver turret can now be accessed as well with turret path [-1].
* Muzzle name is supported as well as weapon name. The command searches for weapon first, then if not found, muzzle is searched for. </value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[weaponState]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [weapon, muzzle, firemode, magazine, ammoCount], where:
* weapon: [[String]]
* muzzle: [[String]]
* firemode: [[String]]
* magazine: [[String]]
* ammoCount: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[weaponState]] [vehicle, turretPath, weapon]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  [vehicle, turretPath, weapon]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> weapon (Optional): [[String]] (since Arma 3 v1.69.140397) - weapon or muzzle name

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - in format [weapon, muzzle, firemode, magazine, ammoCount], where:
* weapon: [[String]]
* muzzle: [[String]]
* firemode: [[String]]
* magazine: [[String]]
* ammoCount: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_wsPlayer = [[weaponState]] [[player]];				<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["arifle_MXC_ACO_F","arifle_MXC_ACO_F","Single","30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",30]</value></part></template></code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_wsVehicle = [[weaponState]] [_apc, [0]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["autocannon_40mm_CTWS","HE","player","60Rnd_40mm_GPR_Tracer_Red_shells",60]</value></part></template></code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_wsVehicle = [[weaponState]] [_apc, [0], "AP"];	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["autocannon_40mm_CTWS","AP","player","40Rnd_40mm_APFSDS_Tracer_Red_shells",40]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weapons]], [[selectWeaponTurret]], [[loadMagazine]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]]
</value></part></template>
